reviewText: This will work quite well in my various aged classrooms. I enjoy having the books on a DVD to review as well.  Thank you.

The booming and authoritative voice of James Earl Jones reminded me of what I learned in school and showed me that we have progress as a nation, but not nearly as far as we should have in these last two centuries. I teach my kids equality, but they don't see it very often.
Very educational.  My kids really like it a lot. Scholastic is the best, their DVD brings their books to life.
